comments: Fourth column in A104684. - _Paul Barry_, May 02 2005
references: A. Petojevic and N. Dapic, The vAm(a,b,c;z) function, Preprint 2013, http://www.mi.sanu.ac.rs/~gvm/radovi/AP-Budva.pdf
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
formula: a(n)=binomial(2n+3, n) * binomial(n+3, 3); - Paul Barry, May 02 2005G.f.: G(0) where G(k)= 1 + 4*x*(k+1)*(4*k+5)/((2*k+1)^2 - x*(2*k+1)^2*(2*k+3)*(4*k+7)/(x*(2*k+3)*(4*k+7) + 2*(k+1)^2/G(k+1))); (continued fraction, 3rd kind, 3-step). - Sergei N. Gladkovskii, Jul 12 2012Conjecture: n*a(n) +2*(n-11)*a(n-1) +12*(-2*n-1)*a(n-2)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 24 2012
prog: (MAGMA) [Binomial(2*n+3, n)*Binomial(n+3, 3): n in [0..20]]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Aug 20 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
